The lifetime should refer to the plant type(s) for which capital costs have been reported. If capital cost for more than one plant type has been reported, modellers should report lifetime for the additional plant types by adding variables Lifetime|Gases|Coal|w/ CCS|2, ... Lifetime|Gases|Coal|w/ CCS|N (matching the assignment of plant types to technologies in the reporting of capital costs as documented in the comments sheet).
